p.s: The non-fictional text Hope of escape lost in translation is written by Zia Haider Rahman and it was published on a sundaySunday the 17th December 2016.
The first paragraph is about the fact that translating for people who don't speak englishEnglish is very expensive.
It is also about the problem immigrant have and which message we says to them.
The second paragraph is about the life of the Bangladeshis and about the choice that they have between a normal life and a criminal life.
In the third paragraph the author describes his experiences and his history how he learn englishEnglish and when he comes to Britain.
He also tells about his school time and his teachers.
In the last paragraph he says what are some problems and he says you don't get independence and responsible for yourself when someone is holding you up.
He makes the thesethesis that the biggest problem is to not speaking up.
He thinks it is important to learn englishEnglish.
